description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Acadian Geology: an account of the geological structure and mineral resources of Nova Scotia, and portions of the neighbouring provinces of British America. [With maps.]]" Author: Dawson, John William - Sir Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 07108.i.47." Page: 434 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1868 Publisher: Macmillan & Co. Edition: Second edition, revised and enlarged. With a geological map and numerous illustrations. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000883102 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
